meaning_template: Percentage of respondents indicating '{category}' of on-the-job training is required.

categories.2: Anything beyond short demonstration, up to and including 1 month
categories.3: Over 1 month, up to and including 3 months
categories.4: Over 3 months, up to and including 6 months
categories.5: Over 6 months, up to and including 1 year
categories.6: Over 1 year, up to and including 2 years
categories.7: Over 2 years, up to and including 4 years
categories.8: Over 4 years, up to and including 10 years

_comment: This defines a CATEGORY DISTRIBUTION scale. Each category becomes a separate interval scale (OJ-1, OJ-2, ... OJ-9). When parsing rating data, map: Element ID='3.A.3', Scale ID='OJ', Category=N -> scale_id='OJ-N', value=Data Value (percentage 0-100).
